title: Life expectancy in North America 2019
summary: In 2019 , 81 % of North civilian North_America employees in the America were Females .
Only 84 % of North North_America officers were Females , while 80 % of North_America officers were Males .
The Life divide North_America in the America is an indisputably male-dominated profession , particularly in the Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) .
gold: This statistic shows the average life expectancy in North America for those born in 2019 , by gender and region.
In Canada , the average life expectancy was 80 years for males and 84 years for females in 2019.
Life expectancy in North America Of those considered in this statistic , the life expectancy of female Canadian infants born in 2019 was the longest , at 84 years .
